name: CVE-2011-4802
description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Dolibarr 3.1.0 RC and probably earlier allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) sortfield, (2) sortorder, and (3) sall parameters to user/index.php and (b) user/group/index.php; the id parameter to (4) info.php, (5) perms.php, (6) param_ihm.php, (7) note.php, and (8) fiche.php in user/; and (9) rowid parameter to admin/boxes.php.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:*:rc:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:3.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.7.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:3.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
